properties.description: Piipeline to automate vxlan tenant and remote SD-Wan access

properties.commands:
rm -rf impact
git clone http://192.168.1.100:8090/tdub/impact.git
cd impact
git checkout impact-test

sudo gitlab-runner stop
sudo gitlab-runner start

properties.description: Ansible YAML files  are Version Controlled for  Single Source of Truth for VXLAN/EVPN

properties.commands:
sudo gitlab-runner stop
sudo gitlab-runner start

sudo gitlab-runner stop
sudo gitlab-runner start

actions.name: Execute Terminal Command(s)
actions.title: Apply Config to NSO VXLAN SERVICE

properties.commands:
switch cli
config
vxlan-tenant $env.variable_01E8MAX5M79KQ1neCpIPGn6mdsMEDaPhlHX.env.variable_01E8MAX5M79KQ1neCpIPGn6mdsMEDaPhlHX$ fabric fabric1
segments test network $env.variable_01E8OE2XVJYL96UFMltNYv4K5TiRmjmikQ3.env.variable_01E8OE2XVJYL96UFMltNYv4K5TiRmjmikQ3$
segments test suppress-arp true
segments test connection leaf1 $env.variable_01E8OHUSVRF8I5EuR3GksC6wZosoa8xIwK5.env.variable_01E8OHUSVRF8I5EuR3GksC6wZosoa8xIwK5$
segments test connection leaf2 $env.variable_01E8OI8M6NNBC0KbVkdvTek1Mm1G2ozKDP3.env.variable_01E8OI8M6NNBC0KbVkdvTek1Mm1G2ozKDP3$
commit
properties.display_name: Apply Config to NSO VXLAN SERVICE

actions.name: Execute Terminal Command(s)
actions.title: Post Check VXLAN Tenant Sync Check

properties.display_name: Post Check VXLAN Tenant Sync Check

properties.commands:
sudo gitlab-runner stop
sudo gitlab-runner start

sudo gitlab-runner stop
sudo gitlab-runner start

actions.name: Execute Terminal Command(s)
actions.title: Deploy Remote Access Template for SD-WAN

properties.display_name: Deploy Remote Access Template for SD-WAN

properties.commands:
sudo gitlab-runner stop
sudo gitlab-runner start
